topics.body:
The hardest thing an author can do would be killing his characters.
Sure, you can kill hundreds of nameless ones but what about those with a name, personality and history?
An author's characters are the same as his children.

If he keeps killing them, the story gets darker. And if he just wants to kill them, you know there's something wrong with him.

*looking at game of thrones author*

topics.body:
I had a dream that I was visited by Markiplier, Wade and Bob.
But it wasn't my house.
And that wasn't me.

I was watching from another person's point of view.
And he was in Ireland.
